name: nonbiologically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not connected with the natural processes of living things: The components of RNA can be produced nonbiologically. They tried to prove that artificial flight can be done non-biologically.
Nonbiologically related people are not related by birth: The family network may sometimes be widened to include nonbiologically related persons. This process is usually undertaken by two non-biologically related people. Related word
nonbiological
More examplesFewer examplesMany cases of depression are nonbiologically based.Families may incorporate nonbiologically related individuals in a variety of ways.The study looked at families that included both biologically related siblings and non-biologically related siblings.
